tension_headache.name: Tension Headache
tension_headache.description: Most common type of headache, often caused by stress, poor posture, or muscle tension
self_care: Rest in a quiet, dark room
Apply cold or warm compress to head/neck
tension_headache.when_to_seek_care: If headaches become frequent, severe, or interfere with daily activities

migraine.name: Migraine
migraine.description: Intense headache often accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light and sound
self_care: Rest in a quiet, dark room
migraine.when_to_seek_care: If this is your first severe headache, or if pattern changes significantly

viral_upper_respiratory.name: Viral Upper Respiratory Infection
viral_upper_respiratory.description: Common cold or viral infection affecting the upper respiratory system
viral_upper_respiratory.when_to_seek_care: If symptoms worsen after a week, develop high fever, or have difficulty breathing

gastroenteritis.name: Gastroenteritis (Stomach Bug)
gastroenteritis.description: Inflammation of the stomach and intestines, usually caused by viral or bacterial infection
self_care: Stay hydrated with small, frequent sips of water
Avoid dairy, fatty, or spicy foods
Rest and avoid solid foods initially
gastroenteritis.when_to_seek_care: If unable to keep fluids down for 24+ hours, signs of severe dehydration, or blood in vomit/stool

anxiety_related.name: Anxiety-Related Symptoms
anxiety_related.description: Physical symptoms that can occur due to anxiety or panic
anxiety_related.when_to_seek_care: If symptoms are severe, persistent, or significantly impact daily life

severe_allergic_reaction.name: Severe Allergic Reaction
severe_allergic_reaction.action: CALL 911 IMMEDIATELY - Use EpiPen if available
